instruction: Describe the career goals of a graphic designer.
output: The career goals of a graphic designer include creating innovative designs that effectively communicate clients' visions, mastering advanced tools and technologies, and staying up-to-date on trends in the design field. They should also strive to build a professional portfolio of work that accurately represents their capabilities and skills. Graphic designers should also set goals to continually expand their knowledge, hone their technical mastery, and increase their ability to create impactful and thoughtful designs.
